message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I take 60 and you take 40.
Let's split it 55-45, I think I deserve a bit more
Bob, let's be reasonable. We both lose if this drags on. I'll take a little less - 55 -  and we can both walk away with something.
Meet me in the middle, 52-48 and we're done
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option.  Let's end this before we both lose out.
